item.title: Video Develop Environment
item.description: ffmpeg-develop: vscode + docker + ssh Dockerfile 1FROM vonsago/ffmpeg-devel 2RUN mkdir /var/run/sshd && apt-get install -y openssh-server --allow-unauthenticated && echo 'root:root' | chpasswd && sed -i 's/#PermitRootLogin prohibit-password/PermitRootLogin yes/' /etc/ssh/sshd_config && useradd -ms /bin/bash debugger && echo 'debugger:pwd' | chpasswd 3RUN wget "http://ftp.gnu.org/gnu/gdb/gdb-7.11.tar.gz" && tar -xvzf gdb-7.11.tar.gz && cd gdb-7.11 && ./configure && make && make install 4RUN apt-get install -y --allow-unauthenticated clang 5CMD ["/usr/sbin/sshd", "-D"] 1docker build -f Dockerfil.dev --no-cache -t vonsago/ffmpeg-dev .
